title: Rise 2: Resurrection PC
description:
the image files where created using CloneCD 5.3.1.3

there is no serial or crack needed for this game it plays stright off the cd image...

mout the image file with daemon tools or any other mount program you like....

then open the cd image and set all the following files to run in compatibility mode for win95

AUTORUN.EXE
RISE2 - Shortcut
RISE2.EXE
SETUP - Shortcut
SETUP.BAT

after that u can run the AUTORUN.EXE file to strat the program.... (note) i found using the numpad

buttons to navigate is the easiest... navigate to the setup option.... go to sound, now for me i got

sound to work on the soundblaster and soundblaster pro choices but this may b diffenet for eveyone, jus

play around with choosing and testing sound till u get 1 that works for u.... also u may want to check

the video options and change them if desired....also check that u got the right controls set to

use...then play the game till ur eyes bleed...

the file was scanned using ESET NOD32 Smart Security Business Edition 3.0.645.0
